ERR_TXN_IMBALANCE.title: Transaction Imbalance
ERR_TXN_IMBALANCE.tmpl: Transaction {0} has debits and credits which do not balance.

ERR_TXN_SINGLE_ENTRY.title: Single Entry Lines
ERR_TXN_SINGLE_ENTRY.tmpl: Transaction contains both debits and credits on the same line.

ERR_TXN_ZERO.title: Zero-Valued Lines
ERR_TXN_ZERO.tmpl: Invalid transaction(s) line missing both debit and credit amounts

ERR_TXN_MULTI_DATE.title: Multiple Transaction Dates
ERR_TXN_MULTI_DATE.tmpl: Transaction dates do not agree.  Multiple dates detected for single transaction(s)

ERR_TXN_EMPTY_ACCOUNT.title: Empty Transaction Account
ERR_TXN_EMPTY_ACCOUNT.tmpl: Empty account field detect in transaction(s)

ERR_TXN_EMPTY_DC_TYPE.title: Empty Debitor/Creditor Type
ERR_TXN_EMPTY_DC_TYPE.tmpl: Empty debitor/creditor type detected in transaction(s) with debitor/creditor id present

ERR_TXN_EMPTY_DC_UUID.title: Empty Debitor/Creditor ID
ERR_TXN_EMPTY_DC_UUID.tmpl: Empty debitor/creditor ID detected in transaction(s) with debitor/creditor type present

ERR_TXN_UNRECOGNIZED_DATE.title: Unrecognized Transaction Date
ERR_TXN_UNRECOGNIZED_DATE.tmpl: Unrecognized dates in transaction(s).  Dates do not fall within a valid fiscal year

ERR_HTTP_INTERNAL.title: Internal Server Error
ERR_HTTP_INTERNAL.tmpl: Server returned a '{0}' internal error response for url '{1}'.

ERR_AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.title: Authorized Access
ERR_AUTH_UNAUTHORIZED.tmpl: User is not authorized to perform this action.

ERR_DATABASE.title: Database Exception
ERR_DATABASE.tmpl: The database raised error code '{0}' for url {1}.

ERR_ACCOUNT_NULL.title: Null Accounts
ERR_ACCOUNT_NULL.tmpl: Undefined or null accounts included in transaction(s).

ERR_RECORD_NOT_FOUND.title: Record Not Found
ERR_RECORD_NOT_FOUND.tmpl: The record you were looking for could not be retrieved

ERR_INVALID_PRICE.title: Invalid Price Detected
ERR_INVALID_PRICE.tmpl: Items require a nonzero, positive price.  The price '{0}' is invalid or empty.

ERR_INVALID_CODE.title: Invalid Code Detected
ERR_INVALID_CODE.tmpl: An invalid code was detected in the input.  The code '{0}' is invalid or empty.

ERR_INVALID_LABEL.title: Invalid Label Detected
ERR_INVALID_LABEL.tmpl: An invalid label was detected in the input.  Labels must be alphanumeric positive length strings.  The label '{0}' is invalid or empty.

ERR_ACCOUNT_EXISTS.title: Account Already Exists
ERR_ACCOUNT_EXISTS.tmpl: Account number '{0}' already exists in the chart of accounts.  Account numbers must be unique.

ERR_CANNOT_INSERT_ACCOUNT.title: Account Insert Error
ERR_CANNOT_INSERT_ACCOUNT.tmpl: A problem occurred writing account number '{0}' to the database.  Please refresh the page and try again.

ERR_CANNOT_REMOVE_ACCOUNT.title: Cannot Remove Accounts
ERR_CANNOT_REMOVE_ACCOUNT.tmpl: Users are not allowed to remove accounts.  Once an account has been created, it must remain in the chart of accounts to ensure data integrity.

ERR_CANNOT_EDIT_ACCOUNT.title: Cannot Edit Accounts
ERR_CANNOT_EDIT_ACCOUNT.tmpl: Users are not allowed to edit accounts.  Once an account has been created, it must remain intact in the chart of accounts to ensure data integrity.
